title: Hungry While On-Board? Just Place an Order And Food Will be Available
text:
Hungry While On-Board? Just Place an Order And Food Will be Available Hungry While On-Board? Just Place an Order And Food Will be Available 0 
There are a number of troubles the mass transportation mediums have to face. The Railways is a preferred mode of mass transportation, and hence it also faced the problem of food supply to passengers while they were on the train. Though there are a number of stalls available at various stations, yet the train cannot provide such time when one can get down, go to the stall and bring in the food. To meet this requirement, the Railways tried to provide a pantry car to the long route trains but the quality of the food was always under radar and compliant, and therefore it did not work out. In the modern days, the Railways thought out of the box and tried to have the services from private caterers. There are a few leading caterers who have huge network and they offer the food parcel services to the passengers that can satisfy the hunger of the passengers and solve the problem of the Department of Railway also. 
The service: The service of the food parcel is very easy. The passenger can place the order or even his relatives which are not on train can place the order for food to the caterer. The order can be placed with the help of the website of the service provider as well as the call centre agent can also help to place the order. In both the modes, one can check the menu and order food as per own preference. The passenger or the person who wants to place the order can also pay online with the help Credit card, Debit card or even net banking. In the offline mode, the passenger can make cash payment to the delivery boy when he offers the delivery. 
Required details: To have the food delivery in train, the passenger needs to provide contact details and PNR number. He also needs to tell at which station he wants to have the delivery of the food parcel. As soon as the order is confirmed, the passenger can just relax and enjoy the journey as at the concerned railway station the delivery boy will be ready to deliver the food parcel. As soon as the train reaches to the station, the delivery boy comes to the seat of the passenger and provides the food parcel. 
The food: The food is delicious and healthy as it is fresh. It is prepared by expert chef and delivered in a nicely packed food parcel that can maintain the warmth of the food also. The quantity of the food is enough that can satiate the hunger of a person. This service is very much useful for the older people and children who cannot bear hunger for a longer period. The food is also available in variety that can help one enjoy it while the journey is still on. Due to a number of quality features, the service is very much popular among the passenger. Author's Bio: The author of this informative content is an expert in the area of food services among mass transportations.
